answerText: mergesort[10] This other sorting algorithm, named for its speed, was formulated by Tony Hoare and involves recursively sorting sub-lists around a pivot.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Washington, Dartmouth B, GW A | 9 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Identify this algorithm that, in the worst case runs in big O of n log n. It works by recursively splitting a list and performing the namesake action with each sublist.
